Poem #1 by: Zack F
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Poem #1 by: Zack F
By Raine on Tuesday, April 18, 2000 - 01:58 pm:

Wings spread I venture through the sky
A dart of light through the clouds
Over the fields across the earth
fire kite of magnificent creation
like a second sun
burning above
Guess what kind of monster this poem is about!

By lovesaurian on Saturday, May 6, 2000 - 11:23 am:

The people cry "The Phoenix, the mystical Phoenix"
Blazing so bright, the phoenix imortal bird reborn from its own ashes. Phoenix, the the immortal fire bird!

Sorry, seemed right to answer a question poem with a poem.
